forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 3am. Cloudy, with a low around 41. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
